dialog.text: Hey %you.first_name%, did you hear my question today?
I was shaking like a leaf!  Did you hear Douglas say it was a great question? :smiley:  Jeff said he had not known the answer, and he's done the HNC!  Have you done the HNC?

I am brand new at this and still trying to find my feet.  Most of the stuff is flying over my head at the moment.  Spent some time on LinkedIn Learning yesterday - ended up just watching videos all day.  Anyway, got to go to a team meeting now.  Take care and have a good weekend!
